title: Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream sermon

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a sermon: There are many meanings highlighted by engagement in a dream, and a girl may feel happy if she sees her engagement in her dream, especially with someone she loves and hopes to communicate with, but it is strange if she is married or divorced. She finds engagement in the vision and may be surprised when she finds that there is someone other than her husband. What are the most important meanings of the dream of engagement? What are the interpretations of the scholar Ibn Sirin and the jurists around him? We continue our topic.Interpretation of a dream about engagementInterpreters talk about the meaning of engagement in a dream and say that it is a good omen in most cases, but on the condition that you are not present at the party full of dancing and singing. The arrival of an important and joyful event that may concern your family. If the fortuneteller sees an engagement in her dream and hopes for marriage, the meaning foretells that she is getting closer to it or that the interpretation is related to some other life affairs, such as brilliant practical success and reaching sophistication in her practice of it. Work, and if a person is studying and sees himself engaged in the dream, this may indicate the optimism and joy he finds with his near success.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' ' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');Interpretation of Ibn Sirin's dream of engagement. There is much evidence of seeing engagement in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. He says that the meaning differs between unmarried and married women, but for a girl, the matter is a sign Marriage and engagement, especially if it is her. She sees that she is happy with her engagement during the dream, while the breakup of the engagement may indicate some problems and turmoil between her and her actual life partner. With the married woman seeing the engagement in her dream, Ibn Sirin says that the dream is evidence of great goodness and tranquility between her and her husband, and that is if she sees him repeating He proposes an engagement and wants to marry her, while if a woman sees her current husband’s offer of an engagement to her and rejects it, the meaning proves the abundance of problems and disturbing events in addition to a feeling of insecurity during this period. Interpretation of a dream about engagement for a single woman: If an unmarried woman sees her engagement in a dream and is happy with this beautiful event, but it does not appear In seeing loud music and singing, the interpretation indicates the good life that you are enjoying at the moment, in addition to having a lot. Kindness and beautiful meanings in her life The interpretation is very promising.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');On the other hand, a girl may find that her engagement is with someone she feels comfortable with and admires in life

title: Interpretation of seeing the president in a dream Seeing the head of state in a dream

preview.html: Seeing the president is considered one of the praiseworthy dreams that indicate joy, happiness, and pleasure, especially seeing the president sitting or greeting the president in a dream. It is one of the dreams that carries many important signs and clues that one must be extremely alert. It is one of the aspirations of many of us. Imam Ibn Sirin, the interpreter of dreams, in his interpretations, interpreted seeing the president or sitting with him in a dream in many important meanings and signs that must be fully known before interpreting it. Interpretation of seeing the president in a dream Seeing the president in a dream means that the person with the vision will become famous for his work. He will gain the respect of people and achieve great successes. The owner of the vision will live his life happily, comfortably, and wealthy. The dreamer will have great wealth at an early age. The person who sees the president in a dream will have a bright future full of goodness. He will have great wealth and live a life full of prosperity and happiness.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');Also, seeing the president in a dream means that the dreamer's life will be full of happiness and he will become wealthy and possess many things in this life. And the person who sees the president in the dream will live better period in life and he will cooperate well. Whoever sees the boss in a dream means that the visionary will take good care of his work and that is why he will be a successful person and will earn a lot of profits and gain fame because of the beautiful and organized work that he does and will do. Being a person known to everyone, and seeing the president in a dream at one time indicates that the dreamer will reach a high position or become a scholar. When the dreamer sees in a dream that he is killing a president, this is an indication that something great will happen to him, but if he becomes a president in a dream, he will achieve What he wants in life and become a person of great importance among people.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} } ; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');And the person who sees himself becoming a president in the dream, that person will always be in the position of a leader and will have a voice heard, and the visionary will be responsible for his parents and his wife and will have A word heard inside the house. If the boss appears in the dreamer’s dream smiling or happy, then this dream indicates that he will receive goodness from the world and get what he works hard for. Whoever rebukes the boss in his dream with a lot of wisdom in his speech will earn a lot of money. If you quarrel

title: Interpretation of a dream about pulling teeth in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The dream of tooth extraction indicates the acquisition of money or the death of a person from relatives, and other interpretations that we will explain to single, married, pregnant, and divorced women, such as teeth or broken teeth by Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq, and others, in continuation of the topic: Interpretation of tooth extraction in a dream. Seeing teeth extraction in a dream shows that the dreamer will get rid of some of the many problems. It also indicates losses and material gains, and that the dreamer will live in stability and happiness. There is another interpretation that says that this vision indicates that the owner will be exposed to health problems, but they will be cured soon. Seeing an extracted tooth in a dream indicates bad luck and lack of luck and that the dreamer will face things Negative and that he will cry and cry and get sick, and this vision shows that the dreamer will live under the influence of these events for a long time weather.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' ' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');Also, pulling teeth in a dream indicates that the dreamer will make many mistakes and that he will engage in a big battle with his relatives and friends, but his life will change and the person himself will change because he will live Alone. Tooth extraction in a dream shows that the dreamer is exposed to health problems, and this vision for single people shows that they are still under the rule of their family and cannot make a decision on their own. Seeing tooth extraction in a dream The vision does not express goodness, but rather problems, and these problems will be in the professional and family life of the dreamer.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');Seeing a child's teeth being pulled out in a dream. If the child whose tooth was pulled became one day and had no teeth, then this does not bode well, because it indicates sadness and illness. And that the dreamer will face great difficulties. Wearing teeth in a dream, then removing them means that he will take new steps towards the future, make the right decisions, and his luck will rise. Seeing a tooth being removed in a dream indicates that the dreamer will live in health and happiness, and that he will live without being exposed to debts or illness, and blessings will fill his life and he will live a good life. atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');Seeing someone pulling his teeth in a dream

title: Interpretation of a dream about eating watermelon for a single woman

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing eating watermelon in a dream for a single girl: When an unmarried girl sees watermelon in her dream, this may be a sign that she will get married soon, God willing. Eating watermelon in a dream and its taste is delicious, symbolizes that girl. She will enjoy a luxurious life full of happiness and comfort. Eating watermelon in a dream and its taste is delicious, symbolizes that girl. In a dream, and it did not taste good, this indicates that this girl is exposed to great disappointments. This makes her experience a state of sadness because of someone she loves. But if the girl sees that she is eating watermelon in a dream and that was in the winter season, it appears that she will be exposed to a state of frustration and a feeling of remorse because of her actions. Which he did during the last period. In the event that the girl ate a very red watermelon and it tasted good. Good news that she will receive news that will bring her happiness. Or perhaps this dream could be a sign that he will get a lot of money, but after a lot of effort and fatigue. Vision Unripe green watermelon in the dream of an unmarried woman is a praiseworthy dream. It says that her health and psyche will improve. The previous dream may be a sign that this girl is not wise and often makes decisions quickly. This dream is considered a warning to be careful in making decisions so as not to cause her Problems. See also: Rotten watermelon in a dream. Interpretation of seeing eating watermelon in a dream for a married woman. When a married woman sees watermelon in a dream. A good sign that she is living a stable and happy life with her partner. It is not good to see rotten watermelon that is not suitable for eating. It predicts that she will be exposed to severe psychological conditions. Because of the responsibilities that fall on her shoulders. He must ask God for help often in order to fulfill all the responsibilities that he has. It is not good to see watermelon in a dream outside the season for a married woman. It says that she will be exposed to many problems that will cause her discomfort. The woman who sees that she is eating Watermelon with a great appetite. Perhaps it is a good sign that she will give birth soon, only God knows the truth of the vision. Watermelon can be immature even in its season. For the sake of the coming comfort of this woman, so that the problems and worries that befall her will go away. But if the watermelon is not in Season, this is not good. It predicts that he will fall into a difficult financial situation due to losing money. She must pray a lot to God and ask for His forgiveness to get rid of this suffering. Interpretation of seeing eating watermelon in a dream about a man and its meaning. Seeing watermelon in this man’s dream is a sign that he will get it. For many goodness and blessings from God if he eats watermelon in his sleep. Read also: Buying watermelon in a dream. The meaning of seeing eating watermelon in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. Watermelon in a pregnant woman’s dream is a sign that she will give birth to a girl. If this dream was in the past few months, then God knows best. The previous dream may symbolize that this woman is living in a state of tension due to the birth process. But the dream assures her that these feelings will get rid of her after she sees her child. If the woman sees herself in a dream eating watermelon, it is a sign that she will undergo an easy birth process. Also It indicates that she will enjoy health and well-being after the operation

title: Interpretation of the dream of the name Aziza in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the name Aziza in a dream. In the following lines, we will talk about the meaning of the dream interpretation of the name Aziza in a dream, where you can know what it brings to you, good or bad. Interpretation of a dream about the name Aziza in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about the name Aziza in a dream can be a reference for guidance, and God knows the unseen. Seeing the name Aziza also expresses a powerful ruler or ruler, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees the name Aziza, it may indicate purity and chastity, and God Almighty is above all things. When she sees the name Aziza, it may indicate honorable lineage and purity, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about the name Imran in a dream. Interpretation of a dream Dream interpretation The name Jasser in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about the name Jasser in a dream could be a sign of overcoming a difficult stage, God willing. However, if a married woman sees the name Jasser, most of them may express difficulties, and God knows best. Likewise, if an unmarried girl sees the name Jasser, this means overcoming difficulties, and God knows the unseen. A married man's name Jasser can be a sign of courage and strength, and God is higher and greater. Interpretation of a dream about the name Burhan in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about the name Burhan in a dream. We did not find clear meanings to see this. However, seeing evidence in a dream can lead to relief from anxiety, and God knows the unseen. It can express seeing proof. Also about forgiveness, and God knows the unseen. When the dreamer sees evidence, it may be a reference for achieving goals and God being higher and more knowledgeable. Interpretation of a dream about the name Hamza in a dream. Interpretation of dreams for the name Hamza in a dream could be a reference to good things, and God knows the unseen. Seeing the name Hamza expresses strength and courage, and God knows best. In the event that she sees For a married woman, the name Hamza can relieve her of distress, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Seeing a pregnant woman named Hamza may represent the birth of a new baby with qualities of strength and courage, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about the name Maddah in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about the name Maddah in a dream could be an indication of praise and praise for things that are not correct. And God knows best. Where pride can be expressed without truth, and God knows the unseen. When you see the dreamer, the name “Tasbih” may indicate pride in lying, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Where he may be proud of things other than the truth, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about the name Dhafir in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about the name Dhafer in a dream could be a sign of success and excellence, and God knows best. I know that if the dreamer sees the name Zafer, it may lead to success in his studies or profit in his work, and God knows best. When a single girl sees the name Zafeer, it can lead to victory, and God knows the unseen. Seeing the name Zafer can also express victory, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. title: Interpretation of a worm or forty-four in a dream: Seeing an insect or forty-four in a dream

preview.html: Dreaming of a worm insect, or a forty-four, indicates a deceitful person and other interpretations that we will explain to the single, married, pregnant, man, such as killing the forty-four’s father and the forty-four biting him, or dreaming of a forty-four insect that entered my clothes, walked on my body, stung me, or ate The centipede insect, Ibn Sirin and others, in the continuation of the topic. Interpretation of the forty-fourth mother in a dream. Seeing a forty-four insect in a dream means a traitorous person who has no good or treacherous enemy, and whoever sees this insect in a dream indicates the proximity of his enemy. An insect or forty-four in a dream indicates To expect sadness, anxiety, and betrayal of friends or relatives. It may indicate the age of a relative whom the monarch knows, but he is an enemy and jealous who will not be silenced by charity and good relations. A dream about forty-four years in general indicates that your enemies have become stronger and that you will suffer from some misfortunes that result from this. A vision of forty-four years in general indicates that your enemies have become stronger and that you will suffer from some misfortunes that result from this. A forty-four-year-old mother indicates the presence of a person or certain events and situations for you, because they drain your energy and resources. Seeing a forty-four-year-old mother in a dream indicates the presence of a person who has malicious thoughts and feelings towards the dreamer, but appears before him as a family member. However, insight will be able to avoid these problems and protect him from his evil, but he must be careful in his relationships in general so as not to repeat his mistakes. Seeing a forty-four-year-old mother with a scorpion in a dream means that the dreamer will receive happy news and tears of joy will fall, but soon He hears bad news that belies the good news, and this will make him very sad. As for seeing the forty-fourth mother with a snake in a dream, it indicates the presence of an enemy in the dreamer who is trying to harm him and will not calm down until he achieves his goals.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');Interpretation of a mother eating forty-four children in a dream. Seeing a mother eating forty-four children in a dream means that the dreamer will be free of the problems and experiences that he will be exposed to because of some corrupt people in his life. He will overcome these difficult times to live a happy and joyful life. Killing an insect or forty-four in a dream. Killing a mother of forty-four children in a dream is an indication that the visionary will get out of his corrupt life who wants to use him and his money and begin to rely on his situation. Whoever sees that he is killing her will soon get rid of him and the evil will go away. A mother of forty-four children in a dream is to overcome and triumph over what would have happened in terms of harm. If in a dream you are trying to kill a mother of forty-four children, this indicates that you have physical strength that works to resist enemies. Killing a forty-four-year-old mother indicates victory over Enemies: Whoever sees in a dream that he has killed insects on the street

title: Interpretation of a dream about rain in the Holy Mosque in Mecca

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about rain in the Holy Mosque in Mecca in a dream. Scholars have given many meanings to the interpretation of a dream about rain in the Mosque in Mecca in a dream, so we present in the following lines all these details and others that are of interest to you. Interpretation of a dream about rain in the Mosque in Mecca in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about rain in the Mosque in Mecca in a dream can That it is a sign of goodness and sustenance, God willing. When a married man sees rain in the Grand Mosque in Mecca, it may lead to repentance for sins and transgressions, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees rain in the Grand Mosque in a dream, this is evidence of her closeness to God and good Morals, and God knows best. If a married woman sees rain in the Sacred Mosque in Mecca, then she can express justice and nullify sins and transgressions, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about menstruation in the Holy Mosque in Mecca in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about menstruation in the Mosque in Mecca in a dream. The onset of her period during Umrah can express About the inability to achieve goals, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees her menstruation during Umrah, this may mean that she did not complete some matters correctly, and God knows the unseen. Also, seeing the beginning of the Umrah period could express failure to achieve success, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees a funeral in the Sacred Mosque in Mecca in a dream, this may indicate sustenance, and God knows best. I know the unseen. If a married man sees the funeral prayer in the shrine, this may indicate the satisfaction of desires, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. When an unmarried girl sees the funeral prayer in the shrine, she can express kindness and live, God willing. Interpretation of dreams to see the absent prayer in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the absent prayer in A dream in which a living person may be praying with people in absentia can be interpreted as a supplication with them for his justice, and God knows the unseen, as it may indicate that he is questioning his righteousness, and God knows the unseen. In the event that a married man sees a prayer in absentia for an unknown person, he can resort to supplication for Muslims, and God knows the unseen. If The dreamer saw praying in absentia for the dead, so he may resort to praying for him, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about ablution for funeral prayer in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about ablution for funeral prayer in a dream could be an indication of forgiveness of the dead, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees ablution for funeral prayer without completing the ablution steps, it may be a failure. title: Seeing a lion in a dream for a woman married to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a lion in a dream for a married woman: The lion is considered one of the most ferocious and powerful animals, as its sight causes fear and anxiety in the human soul. The vision can be considered for her benefit and be beneficial to her, or it is a warning of evil coming to her. To learn about the interpretations of seeing a lion in a married woman’s dream, the following lines can be followed. Seeing a lion in a dream for a married womanSeeing a lion in a dream for a married womanSeeing a lion in a dream is generally considered one of the Unfavorable visions, because they carry many disturbing connotations that cause anxiety and fear in the heart of the one who sees them. He also wants to hurt her and drown her in heartache and crises. She must be careful and take care of her life, especially in the coming period.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');Experts also pointed out that seeing a lion in a dream is an indication of the personality of a visionary who carries within her anger and haste, and thus falls into many mistakes and problems, as a result Her inability to make the right decision. Or the desired choice, and there is another saying, which is her constant desire to achieve what she aspires to, no matter what. It was the method followed, and she violated opportunities, and only reaped losses. Seeing a lion in a dream for a woman married to Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explained in his interpretations about seeing a lion before. For a married woman, it is a sign of bad circumstances and changes her life in a way that does not suit her and does not make her feel satisfied and happy, as the dream warns her about. She falls into crises and difficulties and it is difficult to get out of them or overcome them. It is also considered a warning message to her about the enemies approaching her and their intense desire to harm her and her family members. She must supplicate to God Almighty in supplication, so that He may rid her of their evil and malicious intentions. On the other hand, it is seen that the details of the dream have many and varied indicators. If the dreamer sees herself turning into a lion in the dream, this indicates her bad qualities and her inability to control her anger and emotions. . preview.text: Seeing a lion in a dream for a married woman The lion is considered one of the most ferocious and powerful animals, as its appearance causes fear and anxiety in the human soul. The vision can be considered for her benefit and be beneficial to her, or it is a warning of evil coming to her. To learn about the interpretations of seeing a lion in a married woman's dream, the following lines can be followed. Seeing a lion in a dream for a married woman Seeing a lion in a dream for a married woman Seeing a lion in a dream is generally considered one of the unfavorable visions, as it carries many disturbing connotations that cause anxiety and fear in the heart of the one who sees it. It also wants to hurt her and drown her in heartache and crises. Or the required choice, and there is another saying, which is her constant desire to achieve what she aspires to, no matter what, was the method followed, and violates opportunities, so she only reaps losses. Seeing a lion in a dream for a married woman by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin explained in his interpretations about seeing a lion by a married woman that it is a sign of bad circumstances and changing her life in a way that does not suit her and does not make her feel satisfied and happy, as the dream warns her of it. She falls into crises and difficulties and the difficulty of getting out of them or overcoming them, and it is also considered a warning message to her of the approach of enemies to her and their strong desire to harm her and her family members. She must supplicate to God Almighty in prayer, so that He may save her from their evil and malicious intentions.
